post.body: http://twitpic.com/t558 - And I thought we had power cuts only here in India! Btw, that pic looks quite eerie.
http://twitpic.com/vb5j - Mari, that is an awesome view. Looks as if it has been Photoshopped ;-) Reminds me of a place nearby.
I hope the movie turns out to be atleast half as good as Memento. The music isn't exactly inspiring. Let's see...
